summary: This bill, S.638, introduced by Ms. Smith and Ms. Klobuchar, seeks to amend the Act of June 22, 1948 (the Thye-Blatnik Act). Specifically, it focuses on Section 5 of the Act, which deals with appraisals. The amendment proposes changing the standard for determining the fair appraised value of property from 'fair appraised value' to 'highest fair appraised value,' including historical values, as determined by the Secretary of Agriculture.
